Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 3 Diṭṭhisaṃyutta » 3.1 Sotāpattivagga
3.1.17 Hoticanacahotitathāgatosutta
Diṭṭhisaṃyutta
Sotāpattivagga
Hoticanacahotitathāgatosutta
222.
969Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati—  ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti? “Bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā…pe…  niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti.
970Sattarasamaṃ.
<< 3.1.16 Nahotitathāgatosuttaup3.1.18 Nevahotinanahotitathāgatosutta >>
